name: Piano Grand
description: Concert grand piano with realistic hammer action and sympathetic resonance

performance.notes: Concert grand piano with realistic samples. Instant attack (0.001s) for hammer strike. No sustain (0.0) for natural decay. Long release (0.8s) for sympathetic resonance. Release triggers add key-off noise. Sympathetic resonance adds richness when damper pedal is down. Velocity controls dynamics from pianissimo to fortissimo.
performance.technique: Load piano SoundFont with multiple velocity layers. Use release triggers for key-off samples. Enable sympathetic resonance for realistic resonance. Use damper pedal (CC64) for sustained notes. Velocity controls dynamic range.
performance.tip: Use CC64 (sustain pedal) for legato playing. Use velocity for dynamics. Soft velocity = warm, mellow. Hard velocity = bright, powerful.
